title: 自訂評分模版：著作信息評分佔比條
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:ratemod:sentimentbar-credit-style start={$start} | start=--] | end={$end}]]

[[div class="creditRate credit-rate-with-sentiment-bar {$theme}"]]
[[div class="sentiment-bar"]]
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:ratemod:sentimentbar-arguments theme={$theme}]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="rateBox" [[iftags 传承]]style="display:none;"[[/iftags]]]]
[[div class="rate-box-with-credit-button"]]
[[module Rate]]
[[div class="creditButton"]]
[[a href="#u-credit-view" class="fa fa-info"]]@@@@[[/a]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="rateBox" [[iftags -传承]]style="display:none;"[[/iftags]]]]
[[div class="heritage-rating-module"]]
[[div class="heritage-emblem"]]
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/component:heritage-rating/scp-heritage-v3.png link="heritage-collection" style="max-width: none;"]]
[[/div]]
[[module Rate]]
[[div class="creditButton"]]
[[a href="#u-credit-view" class="fa fa-info"]]@@@@[[/a]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="clear:both;"]]
[[/div]]

[[div id="credit-view"]]
[[div class="fader"]]
[[iframe https://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/credit:backmodule/code/1 ]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="modalcontainer"]]
[[div class="modalbox"]]
[[=]]
++* 著作信息
[[/=]]

author: Jochoi
